name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Full Stack Developer with 13+ years of experience, specializing in **TypeScript**, **API development**, and **Web3 technologies** for high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial industries. Proven expertise in **Solidity**, **EVM**, and utilizing tools such as **Hardhat** and **Foundry** for smart contract development. Strong proficiency in developing robust **SDKs** and implementing seamless **on-chain** and **off-chain** integrations, while leveraging tools like **Postman** for API testing.
Adept at ensuring effective communication and collaboration with partner engineering teams, fostering strong relationships through **DevRel** practices. Committed to enhancing debugging processes and delivering efficient, scalable solutions. Additionally skilled in **JavaScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, and deploying applications using **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in building AI/ML-powered platforms and proficient in cloud-native deployments on **AWS** and **Azure**. Background in compliance-driven development aligned with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards. Strong understanding of model training and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
